title: Any help rioters?
body: I don't know if this is really a thing, but my friend said if I asked super nicely and wasn't a toxic player, once in a blue moon, a ledgendary Riot employee would grant me 1 RP... is this forreal? cus i got Star Guardian Ezreal in my snowdown shop for 540RP and i Legit, deadass have 539RP ;-; Are the Riot gods here? Are they benevolent and caring? Or do i have to find shadier options? maybe abit of bribery? Any bronze riot employees looking for a boost or two? All jokes aside, is there any way I can gain this missing 1RP?

replies.body: No gods or legendaries here, but some poros could help!  :D  If you draw us a picture of some poros enjoying the winter or even SG Ezreal, they may be able to help out.  :D
I think a Rioter will ask you soon to draw something and you will get your 1rp ^^
yeah, i am Leagues newest champ that can predict events in the future, because they look familar in the present :P
